subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: With a second straight victory, the Nets improved to 9-63, tying the 1972-73 Philadelphia 76ers for the fewest  victories in a season. They have 10 games left to separate themselves from record futility.
snippet: With a second straight victory, the Nets improved to 9-63, tying the 1972-73 Philadelphia 76ers for the fewest  victories in a season. They have 10 games left to separate themselves from record futility.
